content: *you can never have too many closets or too many pockets get organized with this great big tote with places for all your gadgets and essentials interesting texture is created by alternating single and double_crochet stitches in one row then working singles in the doubles and doubles in the singles in the next row copyrighted materials from the book hooked bags used with permission from creative publishing international lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # hookedbags skill level advanced beginner size one size 16 x 12 x 3 40 5 x 30 5 x 7 5 cm lion® cotton article #760 mc 4 balls cc 1 ball *shown in periwinkle & purple * crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm crochet hook - size i-9 button some sewing required to finish
